name: TradeAgreement
documentation: Sets an available trade on the house with the given id. Payer to trade with must be friendly.

parameters.name: GoodTypeHave
parameters.documentation: Good that another player sends to this house to exchange. E.g. `17` (#GOOD_TYPE_FOOD_EXTRA)

parameters.name: AmountHave
parameters.documentation: The number of items that have to be sent to fulfill the agreement.

parameters.name: GoodTypeWant
parameters.documentation: Good that is the result of the trade, the one that the caravan is sent off with. E.g. `5` (#GOOD_TYPE_MUSHROOM)

parameters.name: AmountWant
parameters.documentation: The number of items that result from delivering the required goods.
